name: Lux Game Jam - 1
description:
You're delivering a package to a facility and night.
When a landslide turns your car over, you've managed to get out and now need to travel by foot the rest of the way but, at night the bugs come out and try to eat!

make your way to your destination while defending  yourself against the nigh terror!

WASD to move;

Hold shift to run

Left click to fire

I didn't know you needed the zip file containing all the files :(
to actually play the game please use this zip file
https://geo3d.itch.io/luxgamejam1
